customerTB_ID.title: Customer ThingsBoard ID
customerTB_ID.description: ID do customer no ThingsBoard para buscar atributos de autenticação (client_id, client_secret, ingestionId)

enableCache.title: Enable Cache System
enableCache.description: RFC-0052: Enable/disable cache system globally. Set to FALSE to always fetch fresh data from API (use for troubleshooting or real-time dashboards). WARNING: Disabling cache increases API load.

cacheTtlMinutes.title: Cache TTL (minutes)
cacheTtlMinutes.description: Time-to-live for cached data entries (RFC-0047: changed from 5 to 30 minutes)

enableStaleWhileRevalidate.title: Enable Stale-While-Revalidate
enableStaleWhileRevalidate.description: Serve stale data immediately while refreshing in background

maxCacheSize.title: Max Cache Size
maxCacheSize.description: Maximum number of cache entries (LRU eviction)

debugMode.title: Debug Mode
debugMode.description: Enable console logging and debug overlay (Ctrl+Shift+D)

excludeDevicesAtCountSubtotalCAG.title: Excluir Devices do Subtotal CAG
excludeDevicesAtCountSubtotalCAG.description: Lista de Entity IDs do ThingsBoard que serão excluídos do cálculo de consumo no summary CAG (Climatização, Áreas Comuns, etc). Ex: ['abc123-def456-...', 'xyz789-...']

enableAnnotationsOnboarding.title: Enable Annotations Onboarding
enableAnnotationsOnboarding.description: RFC-0144: Habilita o onboarding de Anotações do Dispositivo no modal de Settings. Se false, o onboarding nunca é exibido.

alarmsApiBaseUrl.title: Alarms API Base URL
alarmsApiBaseUrl.description: RFC-0178: Base URL for the Alarms Backend REST API (without trailing slash and without /api/v1).

alarmsApiKey.title: Alarms API Key
alarmsApiKey.description: RFC-0178: API key for the Alarms Backend REST API (X-API-Key header).

gcdrCustomerId.title: GCDR Customer ID
gcdrCustomerId.description: RFC-0180: GCDR customer identifier. If empty, resolved from ThingsBoard SERVER_SCOPE attribute 'gcdrCustomerId' (or 'gcdrId').

gcdrTenantId.title: GCDR Tenant ID
gcdrTenantId.description: RFC-0180: GCDR tenant identifier. If empty, resolved from ThingsBoard SERVER_SCOPE attribute 'gcdrTenantId'.

gcdrApiBaseUrl.title: GCDR API Base URL
gcdrApiBaseUrl.description: RFC-0180: Base URL for the GCDR REST API (without trailing slash).

enableReportButton.title: Enable Report Button
enableReportButton.description: Habilita o botão Relatório no HEADER widget. Por padrão desabilitado — ative apenas quando a integração de relatórios estiver configurada para o cliente.

enabledReportItems.title: Itens de Relatório Habilitados
enabledReportItems.description: RFC-0182: Controla quais sub-itens do modal de Relatórios estão disponíveis. Itens desabilitados aparecem opacos com ícone de cadeado.
